sentence.text: A recent syndromic condition with craniofacial dysmorphisms, comprising congenital ocular defect and neurodevelopmental delay named Helsmoortel-glycoprotein biosynthetic process der Aa Syndrome (HVDAS) (OMIM#615873), has been described and molecularly defined, identifying pathogenic mutations in the regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene (OMIM#611386) as biological cause.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We report on two children, displaying intellectual disability (ID) and peculiar congenital eyes anomalies, both carrying a de novo nonsense mutation in the regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
